actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964 to assure individuals and families with moderate incomes of the benefits of the "Emergency Energy Conservation Services" authorized in section 222.

summary.text: Amends the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964 to allow the Director of the Community Services Administration, in administering the Emergency Energy Conservation Services program, to apply eligibility criteria, for individuals and families to permit the participation of those whose income does not exceed 75 percent of the official poverty line established by such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964 to assure individuals and families with moderate incomes of the benefits of the "Emergency Energy Conservation Services" authorized in section 222.
